city_description: Tartu: A Haven for Explorers - Unlock Adventure, Wellness, and Serenity in Estonia's Playground!

tartu_hall_square.name: Tartu Hall Square
tartu_hall_square.description: Immerse yourself in the historic charm of Tartu. Stroll through its heart, adorned with magnificent architecture and vibrant ambiance, offering a glimpse into the city's rich cultural heritage.
tartu_hall_square.directions: Located in the heart of Tartu, easily accessible by public transport.

university_of_tartu_museum.name: University of Tartu Museum
university_of_tartu_museum.description: Step into the corridors of Estonia's oldest university and unravel centuries of academic excellence through captivating exhibits and artifacts, promising an enlightening journey through the nation's scholarly legacy.
university_of_tartu_museum.directions: Situated atop Toome Hill, a landmark location in Tartu.

tartu_cathedral.name: Tartu Cathedral
tartu_cathedral.description: Discover the haunting beauty of a medieval marvel, where the echoes of history resonate through the Gothic ruins, now transformed into a captivating museum, offering a window into Tartu's past.
tartu_cathedral.directions: Accessible via Lossi Street, on Toome Hill.

botanical_gardens_university_of_tartu.name: Botanical Gardens of the University of Tartu
botanical_gardens_university_of_tartu.description: Lose yourself in a botanical wonderland, where thousands of plant species intertwine in a harmonious dance of colors and scents, providing a serene escape in the heart of the city.
botanical_gardens_university_of_tartu.directions: Located near the city center, adjacent to the Emajõgi River.

ahhaa_science_centre.name: AHHAA Science Centre
ahhaa_science_centre.description: Ignite your curiosity and engage your senses in a world of scientific wonders, where interactive exhibits and awe-inspiring planetarium shows promise an immersive experience for all ages.
ahhaa_science_centre.directions: Found in the city's heart, easily reachable from the main square.

estonian_national_museum.name: Estonian National Museum
estonian_national_museum.description: Embark on a captivating journey through Estonia's cultural tapestry, as diverse exhibits and immersive displays unfold the nation's fascinating history and vibrant heritage.
estonian_national_museum.directions: Located on the outskirts of Tartu, accessible by public bus or car.

toome_hill_park.name: Toome Hill Park
toome_hill_park.description: Ascend to breathtaking heights and savor panoramic views of Tartu from this historic park, where tranquil paths wind through lush greenery, offering a serene retreat for contemplation and relaxation.
toome_hill_park.directions: Easily reachable from the city center by foot.

tartu_toy_museum.name: Tartu Toy Museum
tartu_toy_museum.description: Delve into a world of nostalgia and wonder as you explore a charming collection of historic and modern toys, evoking memories and sparking joy for visitors of all ages.
tartu_toy_museum.directions: Located in the Old Town, a short walk from the main square.

tartu_art_museum.name: Tartu Art Museum
tartu_art_museum.description: Immerse yourself in the soul-stirring beauty of Estonian art, spanning centuries of creativity and expression, housed within the heart of the Old Town, a treasure trove for art enthusiasts.
tartu_art_museum.directions: Situated in the heart of the Old Town, in the main square.

angels_bridge.name: Angel’s Bridge
angels_bridge.description: Cross the threshold into a realm of timeless beauty and architectural grace, as this historic bridge connects the enchanting Toome Hill with the picturesque Old Town, offering vistas that inspire the soul.
angels_bridge.address: Angel’s Bridge, Toome Hill, Tartu, Estonia
angels_bridge.directions: Crosses over Lossi Street, connecting the city center to Toome Hill.

emajogi_river_promenade.name: Emajõgi River Promenade
emajogi_river_promenade.description: Experience the tranquil beauty of Tartu as you stroll along the banks of the Emajõgi River, where serene waters mirror the city's enchanting skyline, inviting moments of peaceful contemplation.
emajogi_river_promenade.directions: Accessible from various points in the city center, offering picturesque views.

tartu_city_museum.name: Tartu City Museum
tartu_city_museum.description: Embark on a journey through Tartu's past, as the city museum showcases artifacts and stories that weave together the tapestry of its history, offering insight into its evolution and cultural significance.
tartu_city_museum.directions: Located near the Town Hall Square, easily accessible from the city center.

st_johns_church.name: St. John's Church
st_johns_church.description: Marvel at the grandeur of St. John's Church, a symbol of Tartu's religious heritage and architectural prowess, where centuries of history are etched into its sacred walls, inviting reverence and contemplation.
st_johns_church.directions: Located in the city center, near the University of Tartu, easily accessible by foot.

tartu_market_square.name: Tartu Market Square
tartu_market_square.description: Indulge in the vibrant atmosphere of Tartu Market Square, where bustling stalls offer a cornucopia of local delights, from fresh produce to artisanal crafts, creating a sensory feast for visitors.
tartu_market_square.directions: Located in the city center, adjacent to Tartu Town Hall, easily accessible on foot.

estonian_sports_museum.name: Estonian Sports Museum
estonian_sports_museum.description: Celebrate the spirit of athleticism at the Estonian Sports Museum, where exhibits honor the nation's sporting heroes and showcase the triumphs and challenges of Estonia's sporting history.
estonian_sports_museum.directions: Located near the city center, easily accessible from Tartu Cathedral.

tartu_observatory_museum.name: Tartu Observatory Museum
tartu_observatory_museum.description: Journey through the annals of scientific discovery at the Tartu Observatory Museum, where astronomical artifacts and exhibits chronicle the institution's legacy of exploration and innovation.
tartu_observatory_museum.directions: Located near Tartu Observatory, accessible by car or public transportation.

tartu_cathedral_bell_tower.name: Tartu Cathedral Bell Tower
tartu_cathedral_bell_tower.description: Ascend to new heights and witness panoramic views of Tartu from the historic Cathedral Bell Tower, where the city's skyline unfolds before your eyes, offering a mesmerizing backdrop for memorable moments.
tartu_cathedral_bell_tower.directions: Accessible via Lossi Street, adjacent to Tartu Cathedral.
